summary: Building a website for Yameen Truck Body Maker company

existing_features.title: Create a hero section with the company name 'Yameen Truck Body Maker' prominently displayed, a tagline about truck body manufacturing, and a call-to-action button (e.g., 'Get a Quote' or 'Contact Us').
Create an 'About Us' section describing Yameen Truck Body Maker as a professional truck body manufacturing and fabrication company, highlighting craftsmanship, experience, and reliability.
Create a 'Services' section listing the core offerings of a truck body maker business, such as custom truck body fabrication, truck body repair, painting & finishing, and fleet customization.
Create a 'Contact Us' section with a simple contact form (name, phone, email, message fields) and placeholder contact details (phone number, email, address).
Create a sticky navigation bar at the top with the company logo/name 'Yameen Truck Body Maker' and links to sections: Home, About, Services, Contact.

Apply a bold, industrial visual theme using a dark steel/charcoal color palette with strong orange or amber accents, heavy typography, and rugged layout patterns that reflect the truck manufacturing industry. Apply this theme consistently across all sections.
Render the generated images (hero background and company logo) as static assets from the frontend/public/assets/generated directory and use them in the hero section and navigation bar respectively.

Update the Contact Us section in ContactSection.tsx to replace the placeholder phone number with '9719774964' and the placeholder email address with 'mursaleensaifi14@gmail.com'. Also update the Footer component to reflect the same real contact details wherever phone or email are displayed.
Update the address card in ContactSection.tsx to display the real business address: 'Saharanpur Rd, Gangoh Khalsa, Uttar Pradesh 247341' replacing any placeholder address text.

Update the Footer component (Footer.tsx) to display the real business address 'Saharanpur Rd, Gangoh Khalsa, Uttar Pradesh 247341' wherever address information is shown, replacing any placeholder address.

new_feature_requests.summary: Company website for Yameen Truck Body Maker
Update Contact Us section with real phone (9719774964) and email (mursaleensaifi14@gmail.com)
